title: Missing Logs on Ignition Submission Portal

content.raw:
I have previously submitted to virtual STIX and tunnel practice 1 & 2 on cloudsim and gotten logs back \(even whenever initialization failed\).  I successfully ran a submission on tunnel practice 2 and then made slight modifications \(nothing that should break anything\) and resubmitted to virtual stix on cloudsim.  I received “Terminated With no errors” for both runs yet I only got logs for tunnel practice 2 and none for virtual stix.  I don’t think this is an issue with the virtual stix as I have gotten logs back from a previous run on virtual stix.

‌

The message I receive whenever I click to download logs is “There are no logs to download”
content.html:
I have previously submitted to virtual STIX and tunnel practice 1 & 2 on cloudsim and gotten logs back (even whenever initialization failed). I successfully ran a submission on tunnel practice 2 and then made slight modifications (nothing that should break anything) and resubmitted to virtual stix on cloudsim. I received “Terminated With no errors” for both runs yet I only got logs for tunnel practice 2 and none for virtual stix. I don’t think this is an issue with the virtual stix as I have gotten logs back from a previous run on virtual stix.

‌

The message I receive whenever I click to download logs is “There are no logs to download”
